title: How lightning shatters wood : the primeaval steam engine
brief_description: SUMMARY:Illustrates some of the effects of lightning. Shows alaboratory demonstration of lightning shattering wood. Lightning shatters trees with steam, this steam energy being converted into kinetic energy
